div.div: Sample site information for Cardioglossa schioetzi and Leptodactylodon bicolor.
div.p: Number of animals sampled/genotyped (N), Percentage of Polymorphic Loci (PPL), and Expected Heterozygosity ( H E). The standard error (SE) is in brackets and was calculated over loci for each population, assuming each chromatogram peak represents a different locus.
